lead_paragraph: A Rio de Janeiro court on Monday ordered the release of the jailed former top European member of the International Olympic Committee (IOC), Patrick Hickey, pending further investigation into charges that he took part in a ring to illegally sell tickets.

headline.print_headline: Court Releases Jailed IOC Exec, Bans Him From Leaving Brazil
headline.main: Court Releases Jailed IOC Exec, Bans Him From Leaving Brazil
